settings.heading: What is your exchange policy?
settings.row_content: We hope you like our products as much as we do. If not, please leave us a message at hello@aliasgoodskin.com and we will reach out to you for a refund in store credits.

settings.heading: What are the delivery options and when can I receive my order(s)?
settings.row_content: We hope you are looking forward to your order!
settings.row_html:
Delivery Options
Standard (within SG only) SGD 2.90 for orders below $68 5-7 business days
International
(outside of SG)		 Send us an email at hello@aliasgoodskin.com Depends on destination

settings.heading: Where do you ship to?
settings.row_content:
We are working hard with our logistics partner to build our network locations internationally.

If you are outside of Singapore, please send us an email at hello@aliasgoodskin.com

settings.heading: How long does it take to process my order?
settings.row_content:
You should receive an order confirmation after checking out successfully.

We take 1-2 business days to process your order (local). Once your order is ready for shipping, you will receive an email with your shipment tracking number. If you do not receive your shipment tracking number within 2 business days, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com.

settings.heading: I made a mistake in my shipping address.
settings.row_content: Please contact us immediately at hello@aliasgoodskin.com and we will help you sort it out.

settings.heading: I have not received my order.
settings.row_content:
If you have a shipment tracking number, please allow up to 7 business days for delivery to be made. If you do not receive your order after that, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com.

If you do not have a shipment tracking number, please contact us at hello@aliasgoodskin.com to confirm your order has been processed.

settings.heading: Delivery, Shipping & Exchanges
What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.row_content:
We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayNow (SG only).

Unfortunately we do not accept cash orders or cheques currently.

settings.heading: Payment
Are your products cruelty-free?
settings.row_content: Yes, of course! We respect animal rights and do not condone any form of animal cruelty.

settings.heading: Are your products safe for use for all ages?
settings.row_content: Yes, our products are safe for all ages.

settings.heading: Are your products completely natural/organic?
settings.row_content:
We emphasize on the use of high-quality ingredients and it is as much important for our formulation to be safe, stable and effective for your skin.

Unfortunately, not all natural ingredients are safe. Rest assured our ingredients are tested for being skin-gentle, so you can use our products safely.

Learn more about our ingredients here.

settings.heading: About Alias for good skin products
If I have oily/combination skin, can I use an oil cleanser?
settings.row_content: Yes, in fact oil cleanser can be beneficial for oily/combination skin and with regular use, it can regulate sebum production, which means less oily skin!

settings.heading: Do I need a second cleanse after using the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser?
settings.row_content:
With the gel-based formula, all residue is completely washed off in a single cleanse. Your skin will feel clean and refreshed in a single wash, no need for a second cleanse.

You can learn more about the benefits of oil cleansing on our Glowing Skin blog.

settings.heading: If I'm wearing waterproof/long-wearing make-up, can the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser really remove everything?
settings.row_content:
We have tested various brands of make-up, including long-wearing foundation, mascara, eyeliner and bold colored lipsticks. Our Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser can easily remove each of them, but we would recommend using more product (about 1.5 teaspoon) for better emulsification.

We also noticed for eye make-up, you can more gently remove them by using the Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff together with the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser.

If you regularly wear mascara/eyeliner, you should try our Best Seller bundle.

settings.heading: Where is the Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser made?
settings.row_content: It's made in Japan, co-formulated with our R&D partner.

settings.heading: What are the ingredients used?
settings.row_content:
Our hero ingredients include Honey, Peony Root Extract, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Sodium PCA.

Learn more about their benefits here.

settings.heading: About Glow Honey Gel to Oil cleanser
How do I wash the cleansing puffs?
settings.row_content:
You can either hand wash them or put them in the washing machine. Please do not put them with white clothing.

After each wash, remember to dry them completely to minimize odors.

settings.heading: How often should I wash each cleansing puff?
How many times can I wash each cleansing puff?
settings.row_content:
Each puff is can be washed up to 150x.

A pack of cleansing puff can last you almost a year! This also makes our Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff a more eco-friendly and sustainable option to make-up wipes, plus save you more money too.

Get your Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff here.

Or you can enjoy more savings with our Best seller bundle.

settings.heading: About Cloud No.9 Cleansing Puff
